entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
